title: DATS molecular entity schema
description: A physical entity of molecular scales such as proteins, nucleic acids, chemical materials. They can be abiotic, biological or synthetic origin.

identifier.description: The identifier of the molecular entity.

alternateIdentifiers.description: Alternate identifiers for the molecular entity.

relatedIdentifiers.description: Related identifiers for the molecular entity.

name.description: The name of the molecular entity.

description.description: A textual narrative comprised of one or more statements describing the molecular entity.

taxonomy.description: The taxonomic information for this material (ideally specified from a controlled vocabulary/ontology).

characteristics.description: The characteristic information or attributes denoting the material.

genomeLocations.description: The set of location information of a genetic element in a genome.

structure.description: The primary sequence of the molecular entity (e.g. inchi code;DNA sequence in FASTA format)

roles.description: The roles played by the molecular entity.

involvedInProcess.description: The molecular processes where the molecular entity is known to be involved in.

relatedEntities.description: Entities that are related to this molecular entity.

object.description: The object of the relationship, i.e. the representation or identifier of the related enttity

relation.description: The type of the relationship corresponding to this molecular entity.

resultingFrom.description: The activity (or process) that gave origin at the relationship between this molecular entity and the external entity.

evidenceCodes.description: An array of labels and ideally an ontology term IRI (e.g. for the Evidence & Conclusion Ontology - ECO) indicating the evidence for the relationship between the molecular entity and the external entity

publications.description: The list of publications providing evidence of the relationship.

dateEstablished.description: The date in which the evidence of the relationship was established.

dates.description: Relevant dates for the molecular entity, a date must be added, e.g. creation date, annotation date or last modification date should be added. a type should always be provided

extraProperties.description: Extra properties that do not fit in the previous specified attributes.
